name: Friki
storyline: The world is in pandemonium, it’s up to you and your team to either investigate or exorcise the ghost. You will be tasked with solving how the ghost passed away and determining which ghost you are dealing with. Once you have solved the ghost's death and know which ghost it is, you can attempt to exorcise the ghost. Experience horror like never before as every aspect of the game focuses on terrifying players and keeping players on edge. Play with your friends or find others to try investigating these horror cases the world needs you to solve. At least 5 different ghost models exist to provide their own unique horror, so enjoy solving unique stories when experiencing ghosts across different levels. You must solve the mystery of how the ghost died in order to banish the ghost.
summary: Friki is an online co-op investigative horror. Solve the reasons why these ghosts have died, determine a ghost type, and if you are brave enough, exorcise the ghost.
